TopicTitle: Crew Transfer, but what about science?

Articles.Content:
So I am on the Mun for the first time in .25 YAY. Shortly my lander is going to join up with my orbiting command and service modules. I got my Kerbal into the lander with the new transfer. But I don't see anything about science transfer. If push comes to shove I will just do it the old fashioned way (Now With Kerbal Kannon EVA!), but I was wondering if there is a way to do it without the EVA that I missed.

I don't see anything in the change log and my google foo is showing me threads from last year.

Edited October 11, 2014 by Leszek
Science still needs to be transported via EVA as far as I know. There's a mod for that in case anyone is wondering.

Thanks for the mod tip.

I finished my rendezvous and docking. I wasn't able to figure out how to get the science across so I just EVA'd it.

It just seems like the most natural thing in the world to be able to do, I am surprised you need a mod for it.

It just seems like the most natural thing in the world to be able to do, I am surprised you need a mod for it.

That describes at least half of the mods I use (Including ScienceContainers, which along with a modman config does this easier - though less configurably - than ShipManifest).
